artist: Natalia Sergeevna Goncharova; Printer: Joseph-Charles, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
provenance: Norwest Bank, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1998.
text: Natalia Goncharova designed this poster for the Grand Bal des Artistes held at the Salle Bullier, Paris, on February 23, 1923. Her poster reveals the influence of Cubism in its fragmented spatial composition against a flat space with hard-edge silhouettes suggestive of figures. The edges of the compositional elements are separated to permit a view of the background.
title: Grand bal de nuit / Salle Bullier grand bal des artistes
